Server Certificate:","tooltip":"Determines whether the server certificate is validated by the client during SSL the TrustStore file which the client will validate against the server certificate when you enable SSL. ","defaultValue":"","type":"STRING","maxLength":0,"mandatory":false,"disabled":false,"hidden":false,"hasDependentAttributes":false,"connectionParam":false,"encrypted":false,"isNative":false,"attrId":0,"deprecated":false},{"name":"trustStorePassword","displayName":"TrustStore Password:","tooltip":"Specifies the password for TrustStore file.","defaultValue":"","type":"PASSWORD","maxLength":0,"mandatory":false,"disabled":false,"hidden":false,"hasDependentAttributes":false,"connectionParam":false,"encrypted":true,"isNative":false,"attrId":0,"deprecated":false},{"name":"hostNameInCertificate","displayName":"Host name in Certificate:","tooltip":"Specifies a host name to validate the server certificate when you enable SSL and set ValidateServerCertificate to true.","defaultValue":"","type":"STRING","maxLength":0,"mandatory":false,"disabled":false,"hidden":false,"hasDependentAttributes":false,"connectionParam":false,"encrypted":false,"isNative":false,"attrId":0,"deprecated":false},{"name":"keyStore","displayName":"KeyStore:","tooltip":"Specifies the KeyStore file which server will validate client certificate against when you enable SSL. Connection Properties:","tooltip":"Additional semicolon separated connection properties as a key-value pair which are not present in the connection UI wizard.","defaultValue":"","type":"STRING","maxLength":0,"mandatory":false,"disabled":false,"hidden":false,"hasDependentAttributes":false,"connectionParam":false,"encrypted":false,"isNative":false,"attrId":0,"deprecated":false}],"type":"GROUP","enableDocHelp":false,"collapse":false},{"groups":[],"attributes":[{"name":"sslv3","displayName":"SSLv3:","defaultValue":"false","type":"BOOLEAN","maxLength":0,"mandatory":false,"disabled":false,"hidden":false,"hasDependentAttributes":false,"connectionParam":false,"encrypted":false,"isNative":false,"attrId":0,"deprecated":false},{"name":"tlsv1","displayName":"TLSv1:","defaultValue":"false","type":"BOOLEAN","maxLength":0,"mandatory":false,"disabled":false,"hidden":false,"hasDependentAttributes":false,"connectionParam":false,"encrypted":false,"isNative":false,"attrId":0,"deprecated":false},{"name":"tlsv1_1","displayName":"TLSv1_1:","tooltip":"Specifies
